text: Hi, I am new here and we just started with HubSpot. We created a template and use it for the landing pages. Everything is great but one thing about forms is not clear for me. Where can I ask question about forms?
Heya!  It depends on what the problem is with the form.  Whats up?

Hey all -

We are looking to bring on a HubSpot developer. Curious if anyone has any tests that they put a candidate through for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, HubL.

I tend to give them 2-3 hours to recreate a sample page with elements you would usually use on your websites, along with a few elements that require javascript.

I then judge them on how modular they've made things, responsiveness, how logical their code is, tidiness, etc

A good one to use is the hubdb. Tests knowledge of loops and various other hubl syntax. Just create a table with sample data in a dummy account and ask them touse that to create blocks of items or something

In the end, it depends to what extent of expertise you need, as the HubSpot rabbit hole is a deep dive.
